jot.ai.steeringBehaviours

Class Wander

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.AbstractSteeringBehavior
      • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.Seek
        • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.Wander

  • public class Wander
extends Seek
    Class that implements Craig Reynolds wander steering behavior.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected float sceneSize
      The sceneSize of a squared scene or the radius of a spherical scene.
      protected float wanderDistance
      The distance the wander circle is projected in front of the agent.
      protected float wanderJitter
      The maximum amount of random displacement that can be added to the target each second.
      protected float wanderRadius
      The radius of the constraining circle.
      protected org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D wanderTarget 
      protected long wanderTime
      Maximum time in milliseconds to move in certain direction when using wander curve logic.
      protected long wanderTimeCount
      Time left to move in certain direction when using wander curve logic.
